trans-unit.source: Create Agreements in Azure BizTalk Services
trans-unit.target: Create Agreements in Azure BizTalk Services

trans-unit.source: Create Agreements in Azure BizTalk Services
trans-unit.target: Create Agreements in Azure BizTalk Services

trans-unit.source: An agreement is defined as a contract between two trading partners for transacting messages over B2B Protocols.
trans-unit.target: An agreement is defined as a contract between two trading partners for transacting messages over B2B Protocols.

trans-unit.source: An agreement contains the technical details of configuration between two partners for exchanging EDI, AS2, and EDIFACT transactions.
trans-unit.target: An agreement contains the technical details of configuration between two partners for exchanging EDI, AS2, and EDIFACT transactions.

trans-unit.source: The TPA defines the settings for both sending and receiving messages.
trans-unit.target: The TPA defines the settings for both sending and receiving messages.

trans-unit.source: A TPA involves defining the agreement settings including transport settings and the pipeline definitions (transform and route settings) between the partners.
trans-unit.target: A TPA involves defining the agreement settings including transport settings and the pipeline definitions (transform and route settings) between the partners.

trans-unit.source: The topics in this section provide instructions on how to create an agreement.
trans-unit.target: The topics in this section provide instructions on how to create an agreement.
